subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Tactile characters must be raised or embossed to a height of not less than 1 mm and not more than 1.5 mm.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Title case must be used for all tactile characters, andâ€”

ol.li: upper case tactile characters must have a height of not less than 15 mm and not more than 55 mm, except that the upper case tactile characters on a sign identifying a door required by E4D5 to be provided with an exit sign must have a height of not less than 20 mm and not more than 55 mm; and
lower case tactile characters must have a minimum height of 50% of the related upper case characters.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Tactile characters, symbols, and the like, must have rounded edges.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The entire sign, including any frame, must have all edges rounded.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The background, negative space or fill of signs must be of matt or low sheen finish.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The characters, symbols, logos and other features on signs must be matt or low sheen finish.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The minimum letter spacing of tactile characters on signs must be 2 mm.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The minimum word spacing of tactile characters on signs must be 10 mm.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The thickness of letter strokes must be not less than 2 mm and not more than 7 mm.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Tactile text must be left justified, except that single words may be centre justified.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Tactile text must be Arial typeface.
